name: places/ChIJOzeo9ARZwokReIOziDZ-Qyg
formattedAddress: 250 E 40th St, New York, NY 10016, USA
adrFormatAddress: 250 E 40th St, New York, NY 10016, USA

originalText.text:
I live very close by and wanted to try a different barber from my regular one, and glad I did!
The place is very clean and comfortable. I had my haircut by Arthur, he is calm, relaxed and understands what I wanted. I feel a barber should have the expertise to not only listen but also enhance your hair through his knowledge and that is exactly what I got. A nice surprise was a hot, scented towel after the haircut and then a razor to clean, tidy my hair line.

I highly recommend Infinity and with my loyalty card, I will certainly make this my new place!

originalText.text: Isabella is incredible! I’ve been meaning to review this salon for over a year. Best little kept secret, she does incredible coloring and cuts. She did a beautiful ombré for me last summer. I have long dark hair and she did a beautiful lighter brown to blonde coloring for me. She also cut layers in and I just loved my cut. I don’t live in the area but I make the trip out to her because it’s worth it.

text.text: Isabella is incredible! I’ve been meaning to review this salon for over a year. Best little kept secret, she does incredible coloring and cuts. originalText.text: I’m not sure what some  of these other reviews are about— clearly bogus and competition playing dirty. Izabella and Arthur are the two best hair stylists I’ve ever met. It took me 20 years to find the right people to cut my hair and I finally found them. I’ve been coming here for the past 4 years and it’s been a perfect cut and 5 star customer service each and every time.. not to mention, it’s the easily to best price points I’ve seen for NYC and the tri state area, especially considering the quality of work that is done here. Very highly recommend.

originalText.text: I LOVE this place.  Always an awesome experience! Izabella is amazing at not just men's haircuts, but also at creating a very comfortable environment and being super friendly and attentive to her clients asks and particulars....as long as i live in the area, this has been and will be my home for haircuts!

originalText.text: I have to say Izabella is the best coloring expert & stylist I’ve EVER had. She is always so friendly, takes interest in her clients lives & happy to accommodate her clients in any way she can. & whoever said anyone can do hair is WRONG. It’s a talent and an art & Izabella has mastered it. I’ve been here several times and every time I leave I’m so happy with the results and always leave feeling more confident and beautiful. As far as cost goes, her prices are extremely reasonable and much, much less than other stylists, especially in Manhattan. Thank you for all you do Izabella! You’re the best out there!
